about_the_game:
Search of the Source is an exciting role-playing game in which you take on the role of a young squire venturing into a dangerous and mysterious magical forest. You have to complete many different tasks, explore mysterious places and fight mystical enemies.

Each task and battle will present you with new challenges, requiring your dexterity, determination and ability to make the right decisions.
As you travel through the magical forest, you will discover new places, meet different characters and reveal the secrets of this mysterious world. Your goal is to find the source of the evil that threatens the forest and defeat it to save this magical corner of nature.

Are you ready to venture into this exciting world and become a hero saving the magical forest?
